secondaries.shortDescription: Score Synaptic Kill (reset at the start of each battle round) tally when a friend SYNAPSE model kills an enemy model with 3 to 5 wounds (1); 6 to 9 (2); 10+ (3) and win 3 points if the tally is 4+.
When an enemy CHARACTER model or unit is destroyed by melee by a HIVE TENDRIL Roll a D6, gain a command point on a 6 and score 1 or 3 depending on specific conditions. Max 1 Command point per round
secondaries.scoringPhase: End of Round or End of Game

subObjectives.description: For each command point you gained by this secondary
For each enemy CHARACTER model destroyed by a melee attack by a HIVE TENDRIL
You killed the enemy WARLORD with a melee attack made by a HIVE TENDRIL model

secondaries.shortDescription: Score 4 every time a unit from the army complete the Seed Spore Node action. (1 unit, 2nd+ battle round, 6'' within enemy deployment zone, 6'' away from another spore token)

subObjectives.description: You placed a Spore Node successfully
